DOC.brief_title: ANDRO 2002 : Dehydroepiandrosterone ( DHEA ) Testosterone Versus Placebo Men With Sexual Dysfunction
DOC.detailed_description: 120 men diagnosis Erectile dysfunction ( ED ) randomize one three arm study , DHEA ( 50 mg ) , testosterone [ T ] ( 80 mg ) placebo . Patients evaluate start blind medication 30 day interval total 90 day . Response evaluate blood parameter , physical examination include rectal examination , validated questionnaire global assessment scale .
